briefTitle: Evaluation of the Tympanostomy Tube Delivery System
officialTitle: A Clinical Study of the Acclarent Tympanostomy Tube Delivery System for the Treatment of Patients Requiring Tympanostomy Tube Insertion for Otitis Media
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the performance and safety of the Tympanostomy Tube Delivery System (TTDS) for chronic otitis media or recurrent acute otitis media.

primaryOutcome.measure: Safety of Tympanostomy Tube (TT) Delivery System

effectByArm.arm: Tympanostomy Tube Placement Using the Tube Delivery System
